title: Comfortable 3 BD 2 BA for rent in quiet College Park community
posting_body: ['Welcome home to The Enclave at Riverdale!', 'Located at:', '1507 Pine Dr', 'College Park, GA 30349', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 3', '# of Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1300 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1726/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', "The living spaces at Enclave at Riverdale are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in College Park, GA.", 'Community Features:', '❖ Cardio & Fitness Center', '❖ Community Events', '❖ On-site Maintenance', '❖ On-Site Management', '❖ Pet Care', '❖ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '❖ Basketball Court', '❖ Business Center Coming Soon!', '❖ Clothes Care Center', '❖ Community Lake', '❖ Electronic Rent Payment', '❖ Package Receiving', '❖ Tennis Court', 'Unit Features:', '❖ Air Conditioning/Heating', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Carpet', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Kitchen', '❖ Range', '❖ Tub/Shower', '❖ Fireplace in Select Units', '❖ Full unit upgrade', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Microwave', '❖ Plank Flooring', '❖ Vinyl Flooring', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '❖ Window Coverings', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 pet monthly fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month,10-Month,11-Month,12-Mont', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '18F425B94AF5493']
